segments.text: I admire the way the sunlight streams through the window, illuminating everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It casts a warm glow over the kitchen, contrasting with the wetness of the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that water is a problem—someone will need to clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of soggy cabinets makes me wince; how can the woman not see this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children eyeing the cookies like they’re hidden treasures, full of promise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They remind me of simpler times, when sneaking treats was an adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t shake off the feeling that they’re walking a fine line between fun and trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
